conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric-style cutaway with clear depth and consistent geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect execution of 3D fundamentals with accurate wall volume and viewing angle.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity in layout and room adjacencies. Internal partitions match closely.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture follows the floorplan layout precisely, including bathroom and kitchen fixtures.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean render; some soft shadows but structural readability is top-tier.

detected_errors.description: Minor door orientation/swing style variation compared to arc-indicators in 2D.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically accurate 3D translation of the source floor plan.
